Question.Subject: Why cant i watch videos on mtv.com "the american site"anymore?
Question.Content: ok...right now i live in Taiwan and i've been watching ABDC in mtv american site since taiwan doesnt have ABDC but now i cant anymore it says because they can't let other users from other countries watch it please help me and give me information why i cant watch any videos now!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
To watch videos which are restricted to a country (say america as in this case), use HotSpotSheild to get an ip which masks your location.
I use it all the time to watch my fav tv shows on hulu from america while living in england.
http://hotspotshield.com/
